term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - sorption isotherm in ion exchange
term.title: sorption isotherm

item.text: The concentration of a sorbed species in the ion exchanger, expressed as a function of its concentration in the external solution under specified conditions and at constant temperature.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 854 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
